courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CEE 437 or CEE 446.
description: Traditional analysis tools and techniques in analysis, control, and design of natural and engineered environmental systems including air, water, wastewater, solid and hazardous waste, and ecological systems. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CEE 437 or CEE 446.
label: Environmental Engineering Lab
